overview: A compilation of music videos from Nuclear Blast artists, including Gotthard, Hammerfall, Helloween, After Forever, Blind Guardian, Stratovarious, Sonata Arctica, Threshold, and Edguy.  Tracklist:  1. Energize Me - After Forever  2. Lift 'U' Up - Gotthard  3. House Of Sleep - Amorphis  4. The Other Side - Sirenia  5. Another Stranger Me - Blind Guardian  6. Blood Bound - Hammerfall  7. Pilot In The Sky Of Dreams - Threshold  8. Don't Say A Word - Sonata Arctica  9. Superheroes - Edguy  10. Sieben - Subway To Sally  11. Ashes To The Stars - Tarot  12. Face In The Mirror - Thunderstone  13. If I Could Fly - Helloween  14. Hunting High And Low - Stratovarius  15. Midnight Madness - Sinergy
title: Metallic Emotions
